options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Lobby:[/color] chat subject hide
options.tooltip: Hide initial lobby subject message

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Lobby:[/color] game list show host name
options.tooltip: Show the name of the host for every game in the list

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Lobby:[/color] resize bars enabled
options.tooltip: Have resize bars enabled

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Lobby:[/color] pingall ignore users list
options.tooltip: List of users you don't want to ping when using the command pingall. Each entry must be separated by a comma.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Graphics:[/color] corpses max
options.tooltip: Maximum number of corpses to show. 0 means none, 200 means unlimited. Performance degrades above 50

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game setup:[/color] countdown enable
options.tooltip: Automatically enable countdown when hosting

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game setup:[/color] countdown default time
options.tooltip: Countdown default time in (seconds)

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] stats overlay visible
options.tooltip: Show players basic statistics in an overlay

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Brightness of player names
options.tooltip: Adjust the brightness intensity for the player names.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] players overlay visible
options.tooltip: Show observers and offline players in an overlay

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Delete no warning
options.tooltip: Don't show confirmation dialog when deleting unit

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Chat panel size change
options.tooltip: Modify chat panel size

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Chat panel size
options.tooltip: Size string

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Chat panel font change
options.tooltip: Modify chat panel font

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Chat panel font
options.tooltip: Font string

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color] remove all Unicode characters
options.tooltip: remove all Unicode characters. Some users don't use a keyboard that support this icons it in the chat.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game:[/color] Default stance healers
options.tooltip: Default stance healers have when they spawn

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color] Reset all AutoCiv settings
options.tooltip: Resets all AutoCiv (REQUIRES RESTART) (DOESN'T RESET CUSTOM AUTOCIV SETTINGS)

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color][color="255 0 0"]Resets allAutoCiv settings. Backup first![/color] (more intuitive)
options.tooltip: Resets all AutoCiv (REQUIRES RESTART) ([color="255 0 0"]Backup first![/color])

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Global:[/color] Chat panel icon delimiter (default is ⟨ or empty)
options.tooltip: To improve command searchability, consider adding a prefix to special short icon (☯ ♪♣‹) commands like '<gg⟦Tab⟧' or '<mus⟦Tab⟧' ♪ to distinguish them from profile commands.

options.label: edit autoLabel manually
options.tooltip:
default: autoLabel will be created automatically
 with the next game (firt 3 letter of each mod)
 if you have changed the mod-config in its line

options.label: show autoFixModsOrder (EXPERIMENTAL)
options.tooltip: Mods sometimes work better when enabled in a special order

options.label: set mods that should always in. e.g. feldmap:
set mods that should always in replays. e.g. boonGUI :
[color="220 185 70"]Postfix UserName / GameNames[/color]: enable?
options.tooltip: Enable Postfix for UserName and/or Suggestions for game Names?

options.label: Any text (limited chars max. 42)
options.tooltip: Any text you like. Maybe your Localrating here? Like LR:-9 or LR:5 for example

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Postfix UserName[/color] or select rated unrated ...->
options.tooltip: You can add a custom postfix - works in game

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]no UserName in GameNames[/color]?
options.tooltip: cuts of your username from game name Suggestions

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game name Suggestion[/color]. next fullMinute (default is next full 30 minutes ⟨ or empty)
options.tooltip: e.g. next full 30 minutes 12:30 13:00.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Game name S.[/color] select normal, 2xSpeed... -->
options.tooltip: set to empty or select a name postfix

list.label: Rules: 1. enable autocivP mods, 2. use Jitsi-Audio-Chat later
Rules: 1. enable autocivP, proGUI mods, 2. use Jitsi-Audio-Chat later 3. use share Resources with friends
game for drunken idiots - ping me by typing my name
1v1 - random map, join by typing my name , wait 1min, i say hi, ... , start
use Map 'Extinct Volcano'. it has something like timeout inside. Default is 25 Minutes
can you do me a favor and test my latest mod update with me? please load new modificatoin from githup first
